name: Shoot! I broke my legs!
description:
A game made in 2 weeks for LOWREZJAM 2020

I chose to go with the optional theme "recoil" for this game.

The concept is simple, you fell, you broke your legs, now you have to get out and the only way to move is by using the recoil of your  shotgun.

Aim with your mouse (or finger in touch-enabled devices) and shoot by clicking (or tapping)

Score is determined by how high you get.
